title: Portrait of Antonin Artaud
medium: Multiple of wood and enamel with one copper die-cut plate, one steel die-cut plate, two plexiglas die-cut plates and one artist's book
dimensions: plate (each, irreg.): 7 3/8 x 5 3/4" (18.7 x 14.6 cm); page: 7 9/16 x 5 9/16" (19.2 x 14.1 cm); other (book): 7 3/4 x 5 13/16 x 1 1/16" (19.7 x 14.8 x 2.7 cm); overall (wood multiple, closed): 14 7/16 x 2 9/16 x 9 3/8" (36.6 x 6.5 x 23.8 cm); overall (wood multiple, open): 14 7/16 x 25 1/2 x 9 3/8" (36.6 x 64.7 x 23.8 cm)
